name: iPad Sleeve  - Mango
description:
Envelope style sleeve sized for the iPad 2 or 3

This sleeve is made of a thick wool outer, interfaced and lined with a water repellant interior fabric. There is velcro closure and a bright signature Shibang flower appliqued on the front.

If you want to have some protection for your iPad when you're carrying it in your bag this does the trick. It works perfectly for if you have the smartcover or it can also be used without the smartcover.






www.shibangdesigns.com
Made in Canada

name: iPad Sleeve - Cobalt Blue
description:
This is an envelope style sleeve sized for the iPad 2 or 3 with or without a smartcover. 

This sleeve is made of heavy light blue/grey water repellant canvas, interfaced and lined with a black cotton. There is velcro closure and a bright signature Shibang flower appliqued on the front.

If you want to have some protection for your iPad when you're carrying it in your bag this does the trick. It works perfectly for if you have the smartcover or it can also be used without the smartcover.





www.shibangdesigns.com
